title: Angels - Engel gibt es wirklich
description: Roger, who has lost his mother, is living separated from his father. As he and his friend J.P. are one of the biggest fans of the Los Angeles baseball team he has got only two dreams: living together with a real family and let LA win the championship. As he is praying for these two things to happen some angels show up in order to help him - but he is the only one to see them and believe in them. Fortunately the coach of the baseball team sees his abilities and so LA has a run to the finals... Written by Volker Boehm
castList: [Danny Glover, Brenda Fricker, Tony Danza, Christopher Lloyd, Ben Johnson, Jay O. Sanders, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Milton Davis Jr., Taylor Negron, Tony Longo, Neal McDonough, Stoney Jackson, Adrien Brody, Tim Conlon, Matthew McConaughey]
characterList: [George Knox, Maggie Nelson, Mel Clark, Al the Boss Angel, Hank Murphy, Ranch Wilder, Roger Bomman, J.P., David Montagne, Triscuitt Messmer, Whitt Bass, Ray Mitchell, Danny Hemmerling, Wally, Ben Williams]
